ygData.subject: Re: me and me and totaly ooc (rant,ooc and pathetic lives)
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL same here, im sad arent I? What makes it worse is, basically, my pass times ARE games. Im a hard-core game player have been ever since 1987. What makes it
ygData.messageBody:
LOL same here, im sad arent I?

What makes it worse is, basically, my pass times ARE games. Im a hard-core
game player have been ever since 1987.

What makes it EVEN worse is my fiancï¿½ encourages me to play, she likes to
watch and when not watching or im asleep she actually plays my character. I
suggested that she should get an account and we could play together she said
no for two reasons, EQ is addictive and she wont get any work done if she
gets into it, and she prefers to play my high level character in relatively
safe zones where she is effectively a goddess and the whole zone couldn't
kill her :)

I actually had to start going to the gym again (after a 3 year break) and
bike riding JUST so I get out of the house.

How many other "hard core" game players are there?

Whats worse is that I will be moving to the USA within the next year and
have even MORE access to games and betas - sigh.

> ----------
> From: schlaban yocksovik[SMTP:anonymaste@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 11:51 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] me and me and totaly ooc (rant,ooc and
> pathetic lives)
>
> From: "schlaban yocksovik" <anonymaste@...>
>
> hmm,
>
> Lets look into the life och chris(my real name) and see what his alst 24h
> was like.
>
> Yesterday same time as now roughly 16:30
>
> leave work 30 min early, go home, check icq, send msg to friends
> "loging on Vashi on solusek ro"
>
> play for 3h
> get killed by a griff for the first time, karanas was no fun today.
> and humans look funny in banded armor
> call for pizza, sit in safe spot, run down to pizza place(2min).
> Eat pizza while wackin scarabs in N Ro.
>
> Gf calls, talk 5 min, distracted by party members wanting to go,
> partymember laughs at a humans butt in chainmail
> gf hangs up askin me to call when the computer is turned off.
>
> Spends 10 min healing after dorn got pulled by someone.
> Tries to light a smoke buy realize that I should have bought more.
>
> check the time, damn 1:00 time to go to bed.
>
> Wake up 30 min late, dreamin of clashing weapons and ugly humans in
> chainmail.
> run down to work, buy a sandwich on the way.
>
> spend 90% of work time reading this newsgroup and every post on eqvault
> and
> stratics, checks maps for now hunting areas.
>
> write 50 lines of code that wont work
>
> AAAHHHRRRRGGGGG I thought i was safe from the computer gaming addiction
> when
> I gave up muds 6 months ago and now Im back in it again. Just as bad as it
>
> was then, if not worse.
>
> Id better log on to EQ again, atleast I can be productive there.
>
> Vashi, man Im pathetic
>
> oh and sorry for my spelling. I know it sucks
>
>
